Recidivist burglar Jamie Downard stole from victims to repay $13k drug debt https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/recidivist-burglar-jamie-downard-stole-from-victims-to-repay-13k-drug-debt/VKDRPKPRAZGN7JYVFGFZSGBKPQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/recidivist-burglar-jamie-downard-stole-from-victims-to-repay-13k-drug-debt/VKDRPKPRAZGN7JYVFGFZSGBKPQ/ Belinda FeekJamie Downard, who has nearly 80 burglary convictions, broke into seven homes.
